about_the_game:
Key Features

  • Listen Servers
    F.P.S.A.O Currently only supports listen-server functionality. Players must create a session for others to join via the server creation window located on the main menu. Players can browse through a list of active servers created by another player or simply search for a lobby to join via scroll browser & random session finder. Servers are able to be password locked on creation or in mid-session by Host players.
  • Weapons
    F.P.S.A.O Is not your "typical" first-person shooter game. Players don't choose their loadouts before entering sessions. Players start with a basic weapon on entry into another players world and can swap their loadouts at any point in time while in session via player toggled quick selection menu.
    Weapons can be purchased from the player toggled buy menus using a the "Score" currency accumulated by kills through PVP combat.
    Weapons drop on player death and can be retrieved by other players in session before they de-spawn. Players can drop any active weapon they might have in hand to swap said weapon for another one of the same class.
    Players are allowed three weapons in players inventory one primary, one secondary, and one shield class weapon some with their own combat effects and states.
  • Maps
    Maps are considered to be a big part of gameplay visually.
  • Playable Lobby
    Fully playable 3D lobby for players to explore.
